resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106660</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106660</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206558</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Ralph Bunche: An American Odyssey</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ralph Bunche: Eine Amerikanische 
Odyssee</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ralph Bunche : Une Odyssée Américaine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ralph Bunche: Um Odyssey Americano</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ralph Bunche: Un Odyssey Americano</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θ*Ραλπχ Bunche: Μια αμερικανική οδύσσεια</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ralph Bunche: Una Odisea Americana</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">examines the life and legacy of this mediator and U.N. diplomat who was the first person of color anywhere in the world to be awarded the Nobel Prize for Peace.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">überprüft das Leben und die Legacy dieses 
Vermittlers und DES U.N. Diplomaten, der die erste Person der Farbe 
überall in der den war Nobelpreis für Frieden zugesprochen zu werden
Welt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">examine la vie et le legs de ce médiateur et de 
diplomate d'U.N. qui était la première personne de couleur n'importe
où dans le monde pour attribuer le prix Nobel pour la paix.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">examina a vida e o legacy deste mediator e de 
diplomata de U.N. que era a primeira pessoa da cor em qualquer lugar 
no mundo para ser concedido o prêmio de nobel para a paz.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">esamina la vita e l'eredità di questo mediatore e
del diplomatico di U.N. che era la prima persona di colore dovunque 
nel mondo per ricevere il premio Nobel per pace.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εξετάζει τη ζωή και την κληρονομιά αυτού του 
διπλωμάτη μεσολαβητών και των Η.Ε που ήταν το πρώτο πρόσωπο του 
χρώματος οπουδήποτε στον κόσμο που απονέμεται το βραβείο Νόμπελ 
για την ειρήνη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">examina la vida y la herencia de este mediador y 
del diplomata de U.N. que era la primera persona del color dondequiera
en el mundo para ser concedido el premio Nobel para la paz.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206558</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106660</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/ralph-bunche-an-american-odyssey</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
